name: iphone
description: The iPhone is a smartphone made by Apple that combines a computer, iPod, digital camera and cellular phone into one device with a touchscreen interface. The iPhone runs the iOS operating system, and in 2021 when the iPhone 13 was introduced, it offered up to 1 TB of storage and a 12-megapixel camera
summary: While you're going about your day, you can use the apps on your iPhone to get directions, make purchases, and control accessories in your home

name: laptop
description: A laptop is a personal computer that can be easily moved and used in a variety of locations. Most laptops are designed to have all of the functionality of a desktop computer, which means they can generally run the same software and open the same types of files
summary: Laptops are used in a variety of settings, such as at work (especially on business trips), in education, for playing games, web browsing, for personal multimedia, and for general home computer use

name: Bed
description: In ancient India beds were both placed on the ground and hung from a ceiling or a stand. A Swanswing bed called 'Hamsa Toolika Talpa' was made of wood and hung up. The mattress and pillows used a special stuffing made of a dried orchid called 'suppatige'(Kannada). This is still considered the best form of stuffing in some parts of India. They also used cotton stuffing which is still used today.
summary: A bed is an item of furniture that is used as a place to sleep, rest, and relax.
